You can set your favorite images as the home screen background or share them with friends! reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Great wallpaper. Great images! Works well on my outdated LG Optimus C
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yay but...
reviews.comment: Gorgeous pics, but they don\'t fill the screen. Leaves space at both the bottom and top. Please fix!
